Description: 8.2 pounds of power and pleasure. This Les Paul model is loaded with features that make it a player's dream and a collector's treasure. Mahogany body topped with Maple mated to a C vintage shaped Mahogany neck with a rosewood finger board and cloaked with an amazing gloss classic Gibson finish provide a perfect foundation for outstanding harmonic treatments.Gibson Burstbucker 2 at the neck and Burstbucker 3 pickup at the bridge make for a powerful pair for harmonic sound production.Coil-splitting by push pull volume controls AND a 10db boost switch activated by the neck tone push pull knob gives an extremely wide range of sonic and harmonic choices.This is an inspiring guitar upon sight, feel and playing. It provides all that Gibson has built its reputation upon over the decades. Quality and Innovation.The case is factory fresh also without any signs of mar, tear or wear. It will come to you in its original Gibson shipping box with all paperwork included. Ebay is very limited regarding the number of photos allowed. If you wish a photo of a specific area or you have a question please send me your request. I normally ship within 24 hours of cleared payment and I am an experienced packer. I AM PROUD OF THE ITEMS I OFFER FOR SALE AND MAKE EVERY EFFORT TO BE CLEARLY DESCRIPTIVE OF ALL KNOWLEDGE I HAVE TO GIVE. No partial refunds. The Studio Deluxe IV inherits a lot of the same features that make the Trad Pro IV a great guitar, but at an even more affordable price. Standard non-locking Grover tuners and the same “Vintage C” shape neck make this guitar feel very familiar. It comes with a Burstbucker 2 Humbucker in the neck position and a Burstbucker 3 Humbucker in the bridge position. Also handed down from the Trad Pro IV are the individual coil-splits for each pickup and the 10dB boost.
